data.description:

Envictus International Holdings Limited ( (SG:BQD) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Envictus International Holdings Limited has addressed queries from the Singapore Exchange concerning its Annual Report for the financial year ending 30 September 2024. The company confirmed it paid RM35,000 for non-audit services related to corporate tax compliance, ensuring auditor independence. Additionally, the Board, with the Audit Committee’s concurrence, affirmed the adequacy and effectiveness of the company’s risk management and internal control systems.

data.title: Ruichang International Passes Joint Venture Resolution with Unanimous Approval
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

The latest update is out from Ruichang International Holdings Ltd. ( (HK:1334) ).

Ruichang International Holdings Ltd. announced the results of an extraordinary general meeting (EGM) held on February 5, 2025, where a resolution to approve a Joint Venture Agreement was passed unanimously with 100% of the votes in favor. The total number of issued shares entitled to vote was 500 million, with no restrictions on voting except for Huangshan City PE Management, which abstained due to a material interest. The successful approval of the Joint Venture Agreement is expected to enhance Ruichang International Holdings’ strategic initiatives and could impact future growth and partnerships.

More about Ruichang International Holdings Ltd.

Edenred has announced its share and voting rights declaration as of January 31, 2025, reporting a total of 241,973,980 shares and 243,244,680 exercisable voting rights. Greencoat Renewables Plc ( (DE:GRP) ) has provided an announcement.

Greencoat Renewables PLC has announced a change in its major holdings, with Stichting Juridisch Eigendom Privium Sustainable Impact Fund, based in Amsterdam, crossing the 3% threshold of voting rights as of January 31, 2025. Imperium Crown Limited ( (SG:5HT) ) has issued an announcement.

Imperium Crown Limited, a company listed in Singapore, has reported its financial status for December 2024, highlighting significant net liabilities. The company’s monthly valuation shows liabilities exceeding assets, with cash and cash equivalents totaling S$3,000 against liabilities of S$3,167, resulting in net liabilities of S$3,164. data.title: China Sandi Holdings Faces Potential Delay in 2024 Annual Results
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

An update from China Sandi Holdings Ltd. ( (HK:0910) ) is now available.

China Sandi Holdings Limited has announced a potential delay in publishing its 2024 annual results due to the resignation of its auditor, Moore CPA Limited, and difficulties in securing a new auditor. This delay is attributed to the reluctance of many accounting firms to take on Chinese real estate developers as clients, classifying them as high-risk. If the delay occurs, it could also affect the dispatch of the company’s 2024 annual report. Despite these challenges, the company assures that its business operations remain normal. However, failure to publish the financial results on time might lead to a suspension of trading in the company’s securities.

More about China Sandi Holdings Ltd.

China Sandi Holdings Limited is a company involved in the real estate industry, primarily focusing on property development and management. The company operates primarily in Mainland China, where the real estate market is often considered high-risk.

YTD Price Performance: 30.0%

Average Trading Volume: 702,516

Technical Sentiment Consensus Rating: Strong Buy

data.title: NRC Group ASA Wins SEK 83 Million Railway Contract in Sweden
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

NRC Group ASA ( (NNRRF) ) just unveiled an announcement.

NRC Group Sverige AB, a subsidiary of NRC Group ASA, has secured a contract from the Swedish Transport Administration to rehabilitate and upgrade the railway line between Borlänge and Falun. The project, valued at approximately SEK 83 million, is set to commence in February 2025 and aims for completion by July 2026, potentially enhancing NRC Group’s position in the Nordic rail infrastructure market.

More about NRC Group ASA

NRC Group ASA is involved in the construction and infrastructure industry, focusing on rail services including track, electro, signal/telecom, and groundwork.

data.title: Coolan Group Limited Holds EGM for Name Change and Constitutional Amendments
data.description:
Maximize Your Portfolio with Data Driven Insights:

  • Leverage the power of TipRanks' Smart Score, a data-driven tool to help you uncover top performing stocks and make informed investment decisions.
  • Monitor your stock picks and compare them to top Wall Street Analysts' recommendations with Your Smart Portfolio

New Silkroutes Group Limited ( (SG:BMT) ) just unveiled an announcement.

Coolan Group Limited held an Extraordinary General Meeting (EGM) on January 8, 2025, at Temasek Club, Singapore. The primary agenda included a resolution for a proposed change of the company’s name and amendments to its constitution. Shareholders were invited to submit questions regarding the EGM’s business in advance, but no substantial questions were received. The resolution was set to be voted on by poll, in line with SGX-ST regulations, with Gong Corporate Services Pte. Ltd. and B.A.C.S. Private Limited appointed as scrutineers and polling agents, respectively. The proceedings of the meeting, including minutes, will be made available on SGXNet and the company’s website.

More about New Silkroutes Group Limited

Coolan Group Limited, formerly known as New Silkroutes Group Limited, is incorporated in the Republic of Singapore. The company is involved in a range of industries and services, although specific details about its market focus are not provided in the release.

Current Market Cap: S$15.63M
